amendment.description: An amendment to specify that none of the funds provided in the bill may be used to process an application under the Immigration and Nationality Act submitted by or on behalf of an alien who has been directly or indirectly involved in the harvesting of organs from executed prisoners who did not consent to such harvesting.

action.text: Mr. Wolf raised a point of order against the Wu amendment (A029). The amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
